fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Mainly following Twitter accounts of Directorate Generals, Agencies, commissioners, European Parliament, ... to get a good understanding of EU initiatives and policies
goals__remit:
WE Solutions specializes in organizational change management and project management using the latest information technology and knowledge management techniques. 
We help organisations become smarter and more intelligent. 
We enable organisations to learn about online work practice and the behavior of people in virtual worlds. 
We help organisations create a business strategy and appropriate goals. We teach and help organisations to communicate, grow, operate and learn more effectively. 
We focus on the human aspect of learning and technology.
